channel.title: Release Notes - 2018 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2018 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 18.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 18.11. Aspose.Email for C++ 18.11 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 18.10. The functionality of the API is same as for initial version i.e Aspose.Email for C++ 18.8. Major Changes Support of POP3, IMAP and SMTP protocols API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.Email API. Product Documentation – Provides detailed examples of working with the API API Reference Guide – Details all the namespaces and classes of the API GitHub Examples – Provides ready to run API example Support Forum – Write to us if you have any query or inquiry about the API

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 18.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 18.8. Aspose.Email for C++ 18.8 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 18.8. The functionality of the API is same as for initial version i.e Aspose.Email for C++ 18.6. Major Changes API platform upgraded from Visual Studio 2015 to Visual Studio 2017 API Resources The following API resources can be of help to you in getting started with Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 18.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 18.6. Aspose.Email for C++ 18.6 is an update to the initial version of the API i.e. Aspose.Email for C++ 18.1 and is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 18.6. Limitations and API Differences Aspose.Email for C++ has some differences as compared to its equivalent .NET version of the API. This page contains information about all such functionality that is not available in the API.

item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 18.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information of Aspose.Email for C++ 18.1 version. Aspose.Email for C++ has been Launched Aspose.Email for C++ has been launched. It is a native C++ library that allows developers to create, manipulate and convert Outlook and other popular message formats programmatically without the requirement of Office Automation or Microsoft Outlook to be installed. The initial launch of Aspose.Email for C++ includes a number of features supported by Aspose.
